name: Thank You Galxe Community!
description:
# Doma Loves You!

This quest is an additional thank you to all our Galxe community!

Thank you for brute testing our testnet, pushing so hard we had to upgrade our servers, finding bugs at incredible speed, all the likes, shares and content. We love you!

## This quest is simple:
1. Make a Doma mainnet account (https://app.doma.xyz)
2. Follow our X account
3. Follow Big Mike for being so nice as to run this campaign


## Winners
10,000 people get 25 points on the Season 0 leaderboard. Raffle.

Quest ends on Sunday, February 1st 2026 at 2PM UTC.


### Please Note
Updating is manual and will be updated every Monday/Wednesday/Friday whenever Big Mike gets to it! If it hasn't updated, come bug us in the Discord.

name: Win 0.0005 BTC on your first deposit
description:
# **Quest Description**

The **Bitcoin Summer** has officially arrived on **BOB (Build on Bitcoin)**!

Don't let your Bitcoin sit idle in your wallet. It‚Äôs time to activate your capital and bridge the gap between native Bitcoin and the thriving DeFi ecosystem. **aaaBTC** is your premier gateway to yield, allowing you to bridge and mint in a single click using $WBTC.

By participating in this quest, you aren't just minting a token‚Äîyou're securing your spot in the future of Bitcoin-native staking and LP farming.

**The Challenge:**
Be among the first to mint and stake at least **0.001 aaaBTC** to qualify for our exclusive "Booster" reward pool!

---

### **üéÅ Rewards & Incentives**

We are rewarding the early adopters who lead the charge:

* **The Bonus:** 200 lucky participants who complete the minting & staking task will be randomly selected to receive a **0.0005 aaaBTC bonus** (a 50% boost on the minimum mint!).

* * **The Utility:** Minting aaaBTC unlocks immediate access to **Staking** and **LP Farming** on any network.

---

### **üõ† How to Participate**

1. **Bridge & Mint:** Go to the [aaaBTC DApp](https://aaabtc.assetux.com/mint) and mint a minimum of **0.001 aaaBTC** using $WBTC or other tokens..
2. **Verify:** Once your transaction is confirmed on the network, come back here to verify your on-chain credential.
3. **Socials (Optional but Recommended):**  Follow [@assetux](https://x.com/assetux) on X to stay updated on farming rewards.

---

### **üìú Terms & Conditions**

* **Minimum Stake:** 0.001 aaaBTC.
* **Selection:** 200 winners will be chosen via Galxe‚Äôs transparent raffle system after the campaign ends.
* **Network:** Any

> **Why $aaaBTC?**
> Built for the modern Bitcoin holder, aaaBTC offers a seamless 1-click minting experience. It is specifically designed for deep integration with Bitcoin Staking and Liquidity Provision, ensuring your ‚Çø earns while you sleep.

name: BLITZ: CHECKPOINT GALXE #2
description:
#### Gotta' go fast, gotta' BLITZ   ‚îÄ=‚â°Œ£((( „Å§ÔºûÔºú)„Å§

BLITZ is built for speed. Jump into quick quests, earn rewards fast, and keep moving faster. No long grinds, just focused action and fast payoffs.

‚Ä¶but wait, what is Checkpoint? Checkpoint is your home for points. We are building the architecture that makes points usable, ONCHAIN. Today, people use it to check and track their points, projects use it to display points or build apps and soon you will be able to do much more with it.

Learn more about Checkpoint with our  [docs](https://docs.checkpoint.exchange) OR check our [web app](https://checkpoint.exchange/?ref=galxe). 

---------
 
#### About CHECKPOINT BLITZ

BLITZ is an ongoing campaign, with quests regularly opening and closing within 6-48 hour windows. New opportunities appear often, so check back frequently to catch the latest quests and an opportunity to earn sweet rewards.

Rewards match the speed of the campaign and are typically smaller than those in our mainline campaigns. Each quest stands on its own and may have different entry requirements.

Happy BLITZING  (‚ùõ‚ó°ÀÇÃµ ÃëÃë‚úß)!

name: CHECKPOINT SPRINT
description:
## 100K G$ total reward. Ends in 2 weeks.
----
Welcome, welcome, (*¬¥‚àáÔΩÄ)„Éé

Good you made it, we are Checkpoint. What you can do with Checkpoint? Well you can check points for EVM addy's. You can also track your points. You can build Apps with it. Soon you also can trade points with it.

There is a lot you can do with it, but it's exceptionally valuable if you farm points. It keeps track of all your points in one awesome platform.

This is a serie of 5 quests, that all end on the 9th of February. When a new series of quest will come live. These quests are in sequence, finish the first to go to the second and so forth.

We are looking for power users that giv feedback and don't want bots participating in the campaign. This means that with each subsequent quests, the participation requirements can increase, but at the same time, you get more of a chance for sweet $G.

GLHF \^o^/!

name: 2026 Launch Season: Early Community Gets Rewarded
description:
This year will mark a new phase for Olympex, with major launches, platform updates, and long-awaited features finally coming live.

Before everything goes public, before the noise, and before everyone arrives late, we want to recognize the people who have been here from the beginning.

This Social Task is about showing real support.
Not hype.
Not speculation.
Just being present, engaging, and helping grow the community where everything starts.

By completing this task and supporting us on X and Telegram, you‚Äôre making your activity visible as an early supporter.
That activity will be taken into account as we roll out future rewards, access, and benefits throughout 2026.

We believe long-term value is built with the people who show up early, not those who arrive once everything has already taken off.

It only takes a minute.
And it puts you in the right place for what‚Äôs coming next.

name: Mahjong Stars: A Quest for $TILE
description:
**Mahjong Stars is launching soon.**

Complete the quest to get early access and earn $TILE before the public release.
Connect your wallet, follow the steps, and be ready for launch. Early players get the best rewards.

**$TILE** is our onchain token - it gives discounts on Star Points, unlocks premium matches and events, lets you buy NFTs, and earns staking rewards.
Star Points are the in-game (off chain) currency you use to play matches, place bets, earn rewards, and cash out through NFTs.

At the end, top players secure IRL Gold Tile collectibles - real physical Mahjong tiles made with real gold accents from our limited 144-piece set.

name: BTC on TON & Beyond
description:
# The aaaBTC Trading Challenge

### üìä aaaBTC Trading Challenge: $10,000 Raffle

Master the markets across 5 networks. Accumulate volume and prove your liquidity. We are giving away **0.1 BTC (Total)**: 20 winners will receive **0.005 aaaBTC** each!

### **Task Requirements:**

* Accumulate at least **$10 in trading volume** on the **aaaBTC/Stable** pairs.
* Supported Networks: **Ethereum, Arbitrum, Base, BNB Chain (BSC), and World Chain**.
* Platforms: Uniswap V3

**Verification Links (Uniswap Pools):**

* [Eth Pool 1](https://app.uniswap.org/explore/pools/ethereum/0x2Cc2cCf05d75Deb6Ec1d0EdcA62eAa0909746bB6) | [Eth Pool 2](https://app.uniswap.org/explore/pools/ethereum/0xe28f06FafC7EC902F7d1D1675256EfA58c3A234b)
* [Arb Pool 1](https://app.uniswap.org/explore/pools/arbitrum/0xB291B377e28736B7F170e55471202b616B45687A) | [Arb Pool 2](https://app.uniswap.org/explore/pools/arbitrum/0xbFB94855Ab497C96739183331d22E93ff61B2a32)
* [Base Pool](https://app.uniswap.org/explore/pools/base/0x19bFC2c53965DB063B3bA5E6F65E7165c81ce0Ab)
* [BSC Pool](https://app.uniswap.org/explore/pools/bnb/0x380e902682311b89576a2757394ba370a05b2310c933446c900a1e061ecb4bee)
* [World Chain Pool 1](https://app.uniswap.org/explore/pools/worldchain/0x0a1f423Bf93d4593873FdbA856EBCFceB060cA84) | [World Chain Pool 2](https://app.uniswap.org/explore/pools/worldchain/0xaEdf410D3Dc5d51de3937ce11eE3be65bfDA025e)
